column1: Kata Robata////Honestly not sure why it is so hard to get a reservation at this place
column2: I have been there twice and have found the sushi to be good
column3: but nothing mind blowing. Liked the fresh catch ceviche and the king/uni spoon but The value
column4: ambiance and service is mediocre at best. Not super impressed sadly
column5: especially when I had to fight for a a 5PM reservation for 2 I was hoping for "wow".
